root.message: The STAT_CONC_DEF field for indicator 9-3-1, translated into en
root.data: The proportion of "small firms" in total industry value added represents the share of manufacturing value added of small manufacturing firms in total manufacturing value added. A company is the smallest legal unit that constitutes an organizational unit producing goods or services. Industrial enterprises are classified as small versus large or medium-sized for their distinct nature of economic organization, production capacity, scale of investment, and other economic characteristics.
